productList.description: 4.2-cu ft High-Efficiency Stackable Front-Load Washer (White) ENERGY STAR
marketingBullets: Samsung front-load washer makes doing laundry effortless
4.2-cu ft capacity offers tremendous tub space, allowing you to finish more laundry in less time
8 wash cycles, including one for active wear, allow you to customize your cycle without feeling overwhelmed
ENERGY STAR® certified products help you save money on utility bills without sacrificing performance, style or comfort
Vibration Reduction Technology balances heavy loads quietly, so you can wash clothes upstairs or while children sleep
Stainless steel drum with diamond-shaped drain holes resists rust while protecting fabrics
Self Clean+ technology keeps the washer tub fresh by removing dirt and bacteria without the use of harsh chemicals
Smart Care allows you to quickly troubleshoot issues through a smartphone app, making problem-solving a cinch
White exterior offers a traditional look
productList.disclaimer: Pedestal and dryer not included

productList.description: 4.5-cu ft High-Efficiency Stackable Front-Load Washer with Steam Cycle (White) ENERGY STAR
marketingBullets: Whirlpool 4.5-cu ft high-efficiency stackable front-load washer with Adaptive Wash Technology senses and adapts wash actions, time and temperature, so your clothes look newer for longer
Wash cycles include a ColorLast™ cycle that keeps colors vibrant longer, and a heated sanitize cycle eliminates 99.9% of common household bacteria
Steam Clean option penetrates fabrics using increased wash action and heat to efficiently remove everyday stains
TumbleFresh™ option prevents wrinkles and keeps clothes fresh, so you don’t have to immediately transfer them to the dryer
PreSoak option allows you to soak clothes right in the washer to loosen tough stains
EcoBoost™ option uses lower water temperatures and increased wash action to get the same thorough clean while using less energy
ENERGY STAR® certified product helps you save money on utility bills without sacrificing performance, style or comfort
Precision dispense releases detergent at the correct time to mix with water for optimal fabric care and well-balanced cleaning
Undercounter installation means it can be installed under a standard countertop, so it easily fits in your laundry space
productList.disclaimer: In-use/lifestyle images - dryer and pedestals not included

9 wash cycles, including Normal, Bedding, Heavy Duty, Delicates, Permanent Press and Quick Wash

productList.description: TWINWASH Compatible 4.5-cu ft High-Efficiency Stackable Front-Load Washer (White) ENERGY STAR
marketingBullets: LG 4.5-cu ft high-efficiency stackable front-load washer allows you to do more laundry with fewer loads
9 wash programs include Cotton/Normal, Delicates, Towels, Heavy Duty, Speed Wash and Tub Clean cycles to suit your washing needs
NFC Tag On technology allows you to download new cycles from your smartphone, while SmartDiagnosis™ allows for quick and efficient troubleshooting
FreshCare option tumbles your laundry periodically after the cycle ends to prevent wrinkles
ColdWash™ option provides the same washing performance as a warm water wash while using less energy
ENERGY STAR® certified product helps you save money on utility bills without sacrificing performance, style or comfort
TrueBalance™ anti-vibration system absorbs vibrations, trapping and muffling noise for a more peaceful environment
NeveRust™ stainless steel drum resists corrosion and features a smooth surface that’s gentle on fabrics

productList.description: Fresh Hold 4.5-cu ft High-Efficiency Stackable Front-Load Washer with Steam Cycle (White) ENERGY STAR
marketingBullets: PowerWash® System features extra cleaning action of the PowerWash® cycle and an internal heater
Fresh Hold® option keeps clean clothes in the washer smelling fresh by using an internal fan and intermittent tumbling that circulate air through clothes for up to 12 hours after the cycle ends
Steam for Stains option uses additional soak times, optimal water temperature and a boost of steam from the Steam for Stains option, which can be added to select cycles
Sanitize cycle removes up 99.9% of household bacteria with extra hot water temperature, delivering thorough cleaning and peace of mind
Tackle super sized loads with 4.5 cu-ft capacity, enough space to clean 29 towels at once
Cold wash cycle -extra cleaning action and an active soak help wash away tough stains, while giving you the energy savings and gentle cleaning power of cold water
American Pride - designed, engineered and assembled in the USA

productList.description: Load and Go 4.5-cu ft High-Efficiency Stackable Front-Load Washer with Steam Cycle (White) ENERGY STAR
marketingBullets: Load & Go™ System - skip adding detergent to every load - the Load & Go™ cartridge holds enough detergent to wash up to 12 loads of laundry so you can simply fill it and forget it

Wash and Dry cycle - wash and dry tomorrow's outfit in the washer with this cycle - featuring FanFresh® technology, it automatically activates a fan so you can get tomorrow's outfit or sports uniform ready without having to use the dryer
12-hour FanFresh® option - a built-in fan activates after the wash cycle is over, tumbling clothes for up to 12 hours so you can finish laundry when you're ready
ColorLast™ cycle adjusts wash action, gentle temperatures and wash time to keep your colors vibrant longer

Precision Dispense holds detergent and additives and releases them at the correct time during the cycle for optimal fabric care - detergent mixes with water to penetrate fabrics and virtually eliminate pretreating
Presoak option adds extra time for soaking before the wash cycle starts
Steam clean option - add the power of steam to the stain-fighting Steam Clean option for even more help in breaking down deep soils
Adaptive Wash technology senses the needs of each load and adapts wash actions, time and temperature, keeping your clothes looking newer longer
EcoBoost option lowers water temperature and increases tumbling action to use less energy while still delivering great cleaning and gentle performance
productList.disclaimer: In-use/lifestyle images -accessories, dryer and pedestals sold separately

productList.description: 4.5-cu ft High-Efficiency Stackable Front-Load Washer with Steam Cycle (Graphite Steel) ENERGY STAR
marketingBullets: LG 4.5-cu ft high-efficiency, stackable front-load washer offers tremendous tub space to finish more laundry in less time and saves floor space
12 wash cycles, including Permanent Press, Delicates, Sanitary, Speed Wash, Bulky/Large and Tub Clean
Steam™ technology deeply penetrates fabrics to eliminate dirt and allergens while preventing wrinkles
Allergiene™ cycle helps remove up to 95% of common household allergens for cleaner, fresher clothes
TurboWash™ technology activates high-pressure nozzles to boost washing power and cut wash time by half without sacrificing cleaning performance
ENERGY STAR® certified products help you save money on utility bills without sacrificing performance, style or comfort
TrueBalance™ anti-vibration system absorbs vibrations by trapping and muffling noise for smooth, quiet performance on any floor in the house
NeveRust™ stainless steel drum resists corrosion to provide a smooth surface that’s gentle on fabrics
Front-load style makes transporting clothes in and out of washer effortless, while the white exterior offers a clean and easy-to-match look
productList.disclaimer: In-use/lifestyle images - Dryer, pedestals and pedestal washers not included

productList.description: 300 Series 2.2-cu ft High-Efficiency Stackable Front-Load Washer (White)
marketingBullets: Bosch 300 Series 2.2-cu ft compact front-load washer features a high-efficiency, stackable design and is the perfect companion to the matching dryer
15 wash cycles, including Quick 30, Hand Wash/Wool, Sanitize, Jeans, Towels, Bulky/Large Items and Drum Clean
SpeedPerfect™ technology provides up to 40% faster washing time, so you can get more laundry done sooner
ActiveWater® technology automatically adjusts conditions for each load to ensure that only the required amount of electricity and water is used
ENERGY STAR® certified products help you save money on utility bills without sacrificing performance, style or comfort
Anti-vibration circular side walls for reducing noise and vibration and increasing stability
EcoSilence™ motor delivers a quiet, efficient and long-lasting performance at 54 dBA
Stainless steel tub with wave-shaped structured drum delivers both a powerful and gentle wash action
Delay start feature begins operation when it’s most convenient for your schedule for added flexibility
productList.disclaimer: Special Installation Note: Washer plugs into matching Bosch dryer or applicable 240v; NEMA 6 - 15 3 prong outlet
